title: website match history dosnt work
body: so i cant view my match history on the lol website ive tried on crome ie and firefox. is this a problem for anyone else?

replies.body: Sometimes it works, a lot of times it does not, it also takes forever to load from time to time. I suggest restarting your computer, and trying to refresh it. If it doesn't fail, you just have to wait until riot gets it fixed.
Does this still happen if you try accessing your match history using [**this link?**](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/44871692)
I've been having this same problem, and that link doesn't work for me either. It loads the background of the page, but match history never shows up. It's been like this for weeks now.

Please fix the match history. the problem has been there for a while now. 

feedback in league is few and far between. match history is one of those few sources. 

its been an ongoing issue since the start of season 7. please fix.

Hi, webdeveloper here, I have tracked it down myself to a truncated Twig.js file. I think maybe you guys got a bad push somewhere or something corrupted on a cdn.  It seems you load theses assets off of S3, so maybe check your buckets.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/assets/1.0.19/lib/twig.js

that's the link to the truncated JS in question.  

Here is the remote IP that it's being resolved to: 104.16.139.241

Please fix. Let me know if you need more info.
No match history, even with that link. The screen shows the frame, but there is no data.

This has been a problem on and off. My [Chrome extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/league-of-legends-match-h/mdgeabipdapmbcpdldplafegigjhpain?hl=en) may fix your issue. [Original post](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4670249&page=18#post50208069).

Some folks are experiencing a 403 issue with AWS, in which case this extension won't fix the issue.
